meanings.definition: Of or relating to the study of cells.
meanings.sent1: The cytologic research focused on understanding cell structures.
meanings.sent2: Her cytologic analysis helped identify the different types of cells present.
meanings.sent3: The cytologic investigation revealed the hidden secrets of the cell world.
meanings.sent4: His cytologic approach to cell research was like a detective solving a mystery.
meanings.sent5: Through cytologic studies, scientists can unlock the mysteries of cellular life.

meanings.definition: Involving the examination of cells under a microscope.
meanings.sent1: The cytologic examination revealed abnormalities in the cell sample.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use cytologic techniques to diagnose various cell conditions.
meanings.sent3: The cytologic inspection under the microscope was like exploring a tiny universe.
meanings.sent4: Her cytologic observations were as detailed as a map of a microscopic city.
meanings.sent5: Using cytologic methods, researchers can delve deep into the world of cells.
